explanation: A majority of the relevant BTC comments express bullish sentiment, referencing patterns like bullflags, cup & handle, and volume confirmation on lower timeframes. Several users reported taking profitable long trades, while others are cautious or waiting for confirmation. There are notable mentions of big fluctuations expected in the coming weeks. Some users point out bear flags and discuss shorting at higher levels, but immediate short-term sentiment (especially on the 1-minute chart) leans bullish.
